title: Is HCL Technologies a good company for freshers regarding the pay? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Alekya Ravuri, In my opinion, you won't find any company better than HCL Technologies particularly if you are a girl. Everyone will think that Bank jobs are suitable for girls . But , doing a job in Hcl Technologies is far better than those bank jobs. If you are a fresher, you will have to select from wide range of Technologies to continue with. You can have work from home if you experienced. If you are worrying about a your pay, you can have a decent one in Indian market..
All Indian IT companies are same for freshers in terms of pay.
